quotes.line: I did nothing. The pavement was his enemy
We will not abandon Merry and Pippin to torment and death. Not while we have strength left. Leave all that can be spared behind. We travel light. Let's hunt some Orc.
You don't steal Daddy's cars
Hey, Killian! Here's Subzero! Now... plain zero!
Give me a minute, I'm good. Give me an hour, I'm great. Give me six months, I'm unbeatable.
You actually think you're THE Buzz Lightyear? Oh, all this tie I thought it was an act.
I'm sorry, Wilson. Wilson, I'm sorry! I'm sorry!
I couldn't even kill myself the way I wanted to. I had power over nothing.
That's a search area of 500,000 square miles. That's twice the size of Texas. They may never find us.

Let me ask you something, Mr. Navorski. Why do you wait here two hours every day when I've told you there's nothing I can do for you - that your new visa will not arrive until your country is recognized by the United States?
I can't ask him what he's doing. I'm supposed to tell him what he's doing. I ask him what he's doing and I'm gonna look like an idiot.
Amelia, would you like an eat to bite?
Hasta la vista, baby!
Get to the choppa
I'll be back'.
Come with me if you want to live.
You should clone yourself... so you can go fuck yourself
Remember when I said I'd kill you last?? I LIED!
That wasn't flying. That was falling with style!
Reach for the sky!
Let off some steam, Bennett!
It's turbo time.
It's not a tumor.
Well, there's a million robots that turn into something. And this is a building that turns into a robot. So what's so fun about playing with a building? That's not any fun!
Get your Fokkin tentacle out of my face!
Hey, leave that fucking prawn man! I will shoot a pig
Hang on everybody - I wanna try something I saw in a cartoon once!
Dillon, you son of a bitch
Not good... not good. I feel sane!
I love it when a plan comes together.
Some motherfuckers are always trying to ice-skate uphill.
A wizard is never late, Frodo Baggins
It comes in pints
Would you like me to find you a box
That still only counts as one!
You cannot pass! I am a servant of the Secret Fire, wielder of the Flame of Anor. The dark fire will not avail you, Flame of Udun! Go back to the shadow. You shall not pass!
I made a promise, Mr Frodo. A promise. "Don't you leave him Samwise Gamgee." And I don't mean to. I don't mean to.
One does not simply walk into Mordor. Its Black Gates are guarded by more than just Orcs. There is evil there that does not sleep, and the Great Eye is ever watchful.
If I take one more step, it'll be the farthest away from home I've ever been.
If by my life or death I can protect you, I will. You have my sword...
